entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
